g.script: rect = document.getElementsByTagName('rect')[0]; x = 50; y = 50; document.onkeydown = function(e) { if (e.keyCode == 37) { x -= 5; } if (e.keyCode == 39) { x += 5; } if (e.keyCode == 38) { y -= 5; } if (e.keyCode == 40) { y += 5; } rect.x.baseVal.value = x; rect.y.baseVal.value = y; if (e.keyCode == 32) { rect.setAttribute('fill', '#f00'); }}; document.onkeyup = function(e) { if (e.keyCode == 32) { rect.setAttribute('fill', '#fff'); }}
